# main()

**Type Method**

Initializes and runs the widget.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency static func main()
```

## Overview

Because you precede your [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/Widget] conformer’s declaration with the [https://docs.swift.org/swift-book/ReferenceManual/Attributes.html#ID626] attribute, the system calls your widget’s `main()` method to launch the widget. SwiftUI provides a default implementation of the method that manages the launch process in a platform-appropriate way.

## Running a widget

- **init()**: Creates a widget using `body` as its content.
